Why did the web page go to therapy? Because it had serious abandonment issues and couldn't be found.
I tried to find a joke about 404 errors, but the punchline was nowhere to be found.
What's a 404 error's favorite game? Hide and seek. It always wins.
Why don't 404 errors ever win arguments? Because they can never back up their claims.
What do you call a 404 error at a party? The guest who said they'd come but never showed up.
Why are 404 errors so lonely? Because nobody can find them when they need them.
